TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThreadExceptionEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当发生未处理的异常时, 由线程创建。A is created by a thread when an unhandled exception occurs. 包含发生的。 contains the that occurred. ## Examples 下面的示例允许您通过单击 `button1`窗体来引发事件。The following example allows you to raise a event by clicking `button1` on a form. 该示例创建了两个类。The example creates two classes. `ErrorHandler`类创建窗体和引发事件的按钮。The `ErrorHandler` class creates the form and the button that raises the event. `CustomExceptionHandler`类提供处理异常的方法。The `CustomExceptionHandler` class provides the methods to handle the exception. 在`Main`类中, 代码将创建异常处理类的新实例, 即的实例`CustomExceptionHandler`。 `ErrorHandler`In `Main` in the `ErrorHandler` class, the code creates a new instance of the exception handling class, that is, an instance of the `CustomExceptionHandler`. 然后, 将该实例添加到事件中, 并运行该应用程序。Then the instance is added to the event, and the application is run. `CustomExceptionHandler` `try...catch...finally`在类的方法中,该示例使用`OnThreadException`语句来处理异常。In the `OnThreadException` method in the `CustomExceptionHandler` class, the example uses a `try...catch...finally` statement to process the exception. `ShowThreadExceptionDialog`方法创建要显示的消息, 并将其显示在消息框中。The `ShowThreadExceptionDialog` method creates the message to display, and displays it in a message box. [!code-csharp[Classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例允许您通过单击 `button1`窗体来引发事件。The following example allows you to raise a event by clicking `button1` on a form. 该示例创建了两个类。The example creates two classes. `ErrorHandler`类创建窗体和引发事件的按钮。The `ErrorHandler` class creates the form and the button that raises the event. `CustomExceptionHandler`类提供处理异常的方法。The `CustomExceptionHandler` class provides the methods to handle the exception. 在`Main`类中, 代码将创建异常处理类的新实例, 即的实例`CustomExceptionHandler`。 `ErrorHandler`In `Main` in the `ErrorHandler` class, the code creates a new instance of the exception handling class, that is, an instance of the `CustomExceptionHandler`. 然后, 将该实例添加到事件中, 并运行该应用程序。Then the instance is added to the event, and the application is run. `CustomExceptionHandler` `try...catch...finally`在类的方法中,该示例使用`OnThreadException`语句来处理异常。In the `OnThreadException` method in the `CustomExceptionHandler` class, the example uses a `try...catch...finally` statement to process the exception. `ShowThreadExceptionDialog`方法创建要显示的消息, 并将其显示在消息框中。The `ShowThreadExceptionDialog` method creates the message to display, and displays it in a message box.
